word_mean: 血吸虫病：感染裂体吸虫属血吸虫引起的疾病，有时称为bilharziasis
感染血吸虫引起的寄生虫病。

sentence.Network_en: Schistosomiasis, a chronic infection, is caused by three different worm species.
sentence.Network_cn: 血吸虫病属慢性感染, 由三种不同虫种引起.

sentence.Network_en: It is of great importance to predict the spreading peak of schistosomiasis.
sentence.Network_cn: 对血吸虫病蔓延高峰期的预测具有深远的意义.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To introduce schistosomiasis vaccine alternative antigen and schistosomiasis vaccine.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 简介血吸虫病疫苗候选抗原及血吸虫病疫苗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...其中以日本血吸虫,埃及血吸虫和曼氏血吸虫引起的血吸虫病流行范围最广,危害最大,血吸虫病,schistosomiasis,主要分布于亚洲,非洲和拉丁美洲,在我国流行的是日本血吸虫病,湖南长沙马王堆的西汉女尸和湖北江陵的西.
A CLINICAL VERIFICATION ON ARTESUNATUM FOR PREVENTION OF SCHISTOSOMIASIS JAPONICA IN JISHAN青蒿琥酯预防日本血吸虫病矶山临床验证报告

list.abs: 肺血吸虫病(pulmonary schistosomiasis)是由于血吸虫的童虫,成虫在肺内移行、发育、寄生,或其虫卵在肺组织内沉着,引起的以肺内炎症、脓肿,肉芽肿、假结核等为主要.
狭头钩口线虫 Uncinaria stenocephala急性血吸虫病 acute schistosomiasis亮绿蝇 Lucilia illustris
...y grey stem and charcoal rot of sweet potato 甘薯炭腐病asian schistosomiasis 亚洲血吸虫病asparaginase 天门冬酰胺酶
为了准确掌握我市晚期血吸虫病(advanced schistosomiasis)流行现状、分布特征及规律,以便制定行之有效的防治对策,尽量减少或避免新的晚期血吸虫病患者发生,对潜江市2007.

means.word_mean: 1. an infestation with or a resulting infection caused by a parasite of the genus Schistosoma; common in the tropics and Far East; symptoms depend on the part of the body infected

auth_sentence.content: Schistosomiasis typically doesn't carry a very high mortality rate.

auth_sentence.content: I put the schistosomiasis studies aside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I put the schistosomiasis studies aside.

auth_sentence.content: He's been living with a parasitic disease called schistosomiasis for several years.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's been living with a parasitic disease called schistosomiasis for several years.

sentences.en: 200 million people in the world infected with the worm that causes schistosomiasis,some 20 million suffer severe consequences.
sentences.cn: 世界上患有血吸虫病的2亿人中有约2000万人承受着严重后果。
